author: ab
msg: Unbreak the build. I've been warned, just didn't pay attention... :)

author: johnh
msg: Flash doesn't escape backslashes before doing an ExternalInterface.call(...)
In order to allow backslashes to be sent, as well as to prevent security issues,
we need to do the escaping ourselves.
Thanks to Eduardo Vela Nava for pointing out the need for this; and Michal Zalewski for his original analysis of the Flash issue.
